name: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
Germany
description: This can be a dreary month mainly spent indoors. However, queues at tourist sights are short and theatre, concert, opera and other cultural events are plentiful. Bring warm clothes and rain gear.

name: Greece
description: Autumn sees temperatures drop. Olive-picking is in full swing in places such as Crete and feta production picks up, giving you the opportunity to taste some seriously fresh cheese.

name: Italy
description: Winter creeps down the peninsula in November, but there's still plenty going on. This is truffle season. It's also the time for the chestnut harvest and mushroom picking.

name: Norway
description: A quiet month for tourism in Norway with the winter chill starting to bite and the daylight hours getting shorter but many winter activities are still vet to begin.

name: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Spain
description: A quiet time on the festival calendar, November is cool throughout the country. Depending on the year, the ski season usually begins in the Pyrenees and Sierra Nevada.
